title: Kroger Says Press Release on Grocer Accepting Bitcoin Cash is Fraudulent
sub_head: Supermarket operator says release should be disregarded
body:
A press release went up on Kroger Inc.’s website Friday saying customers would soon be able to use bitcoin cash as payment in its stores and online. It wasn’t true, the grocer said.
The “communication was fraudulent and is unfounded and should be disregarded,” a spokeswoman for the company said. The release, which was posted to Kroger’s investor relations’ page, was taken down.
